document.full_text: u.s. senate armed services committee chairman carl levin said he believes president barack obama is inclined toward a "robust reduction" in u.s. troops in afghanistan this summer.
document.title: lawmaker expects robust cut in u.s. afghan troops
lines_and_colors: u.s. senate armed services committee chairman carl levin said he believes president barack obama is inclined toward a "robust reduction" in u.s. troops in afghanistan this summer.
